title: Flexible Sigmoidoscopy
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a flexible sigmoidoscopy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying a flexible sigmoidoscopy. This is a grouping of CPT, HCPCS and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes that indicate that this test was ordered only, and not necessarily performed.)
